title: Triphala for Eye Health: Ancient Insights for Modern Screens
author: Harish
excerpt: Triphala has long been revered for its eye-supportive qualities. Learn how it helps with screen strain, dryness, and daily eye comfort.
content:
Why Ayurveda Reveres Triphala for the Eyes

Ayurvedic texts describe triphala as a rejuvenating blend that supports clarity, longevity, and cleansing of ocular tissues. In a world dominated by screens, its relevance has only grown.

How Triphala Helps

  • Reduces heat and inflammation from prolonged screen exposure.
  • Supports natural tear production.
  • Maintains ocular lubrication and clarity.

Using Triphala Eye Drops Safely

Because eyes are delicate, triphala must be sterilized and professionally formulated before use. Always follow practitioner guidance for dosage and frequency.

Complementary Eye Care Rituals

  • 20–20–20 rule during screen work.
  • Palming for warmth and relaxation.
  • Blinking exercises to restore moisture.

When to Avoid or Seek Help

Active infections, recent surgeries, or severe dryness require medical care first. Ayurvedic drops support wellness but are not a replacement for ophthalmic treatment.
